1. A.I. Researchers Are Negotiating $250 Million Pay Packages. Just Like N.B.A. Stars.  The New York Times
  2. Thanks for Your $1 Billion Job Offer, Mark Zuckerberg. I’m Gonna Pass.  The Wall Street Journal
  3. Meta Just Paid $250M To Lure This 24-year-old AI Whiz Kid: A Strategic Move Or A Power Play?  Yahoo Finance
  4. Angry at Mira Murati for refusing Meta's $1 Billion Job Offer; CEO Mark Zuckerberg launched a full-scale  The Times of India
  5. He got an OpenAI offer. Within 12 hours of posting it, Meta tried to win him back.  Business Insider
